channel.title: Abouts on The Culture of Code
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on The Culture of Code

item.title: About Me
item.description: I have been writing software for more than 15 years. Starting with BASIC on ZX Spectrum and Pascal on x86, moving onto full stack Java / J2EE / GWT and now focusing on Core Java / Spring / Javascript and React. I believe in agility in software development, practicing S.O.L.I.D. and Implementation->Refactoring»>Test-Driven Development with respect of Ockham’s razor and Pareto principles. Currently I’m living in Limassol, Cyprus, contracting in financial industry.
